DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric representation for the sum of item scores from the Voice Handicap Index-10.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A 10 item self-assessment for adults to evaluate a patient's perception of their voice and the effects of their voice on their life._Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete; derived by addition._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.
